title: NOStart
body:
How's the world been treatin' ya, kid? 

The bull been keepin their mitts off of ya?

[[Jazz: Everything's chill, except when it's not|TalkToFriend2]]

[[Jazz: The world's what it is. Copacetic one day, down in the dumps the other|TalkToFriend2]]

title: TalkToFriend2
body:
Can't be helped, I suppose.

Say, you still remember the ol' New Orleans Jam?

[[Jazz: I do, why?|TalkToFriend3]]

title: TalkToFriend3
body:
Got a minute to play with an old pal?

[[Jazz: For sure!|TalkToFriend4]]

[[Jazz: I should go|TalkEnd]]

title: TalkToFriend4
body:
Alright, let's do this!

[[Play a saxophone|NewOrleansFail]]

[[Play the clarinet|NewOrleansWin]]

title: NewOrleansFail
body: That's not how we do it in New Orleans! You've changed Jazz.

title: NewOrleansWin
body:
That's how you do it! You've changed, but you still remember your roots!

Here, have this

YOU HAVE RECEIVED THE SPIRIT OF JAZZ

Familiar Face: Give my regards to your folks

<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $vanilla = true>>
